report.title: Count Units Review - Unverified
report.description: A list of Count Units which do not have their Verified attribute set.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations cu LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=cu.id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav ON lav.location_id=cu.id AND lav.location_attribute_id=#unverified_attribute_id# and lav.deleted = false WHERE cu.deleted = false AND lw.deleted = false AND cu.location_type_id=#count_unit_location_type_id# AND (lav.int_value is null OR lav.int_value=0)
